definition: fundus of the eye (containing the choroid, retina, optic nerve etc)/inside the eye/right in front of one's eyes/in full view as a panorama
eye/small hole/crux (of a matter)/CL:隻|只[zhi1],雙|双[shuang1]/classifier for big hollow things (wells, stoves, pots etc)
